unittitle_ssm: Walter J. Handleman collection of Downtown Brooklyn photographs
abstract_ssm: The Walter J. Handleman collection of Downtown Brooklyn photographs consist of three black-and-white photographic prints showing buildings located in the vicinity of Fulton Street and Clinton Street in the neighborhood of Downtown Brooklyn, 1942 to 1954.
